name: School break
description:
Throw your flips flops at each other. Don't let them shoeface you

Features:

- 3 different weapons to choose.

- A variety of presents for you throughout the game. Merry Christmas!

Control:

W,A,S,D to move.

Left-click to shoot. Don't hold it that won't work because it isn't FPS.

If we have enough supports from you then maybe we will consider doing an update ;)
